front.text: Columbus - Sept. - 19 '19'07. 9:45 AM. I will leave here in about 2 hrs for Pittsburg via Pennslyvania route. Am due there at 5:20 this evening. I hope to be in N.Y. city to-morrow mornign some time. I am going to start or rather begin a letter to you while waiting here.

back.image: Building with columns> State Capitol, Columbus, O.
